snippet: Stocks started to fall shortly after the I.S.M. announced that its manufacturing index declined more in March than economists had forecast.
abstract: Stocks edge lower, mainly due to slowing growth in manufacturing.
lead_paragraph: Stocks started to fall shortly after the I.S.M. announced that its manufacturing index declined more in March than economists had forecast.

headline.seo: Major Indexes Decline as Growth in Manufacturing Slows
headline.main: Major Indexes Decline as Growth in Manufacturing Slows
headline.print_headline: Major Indexes Decline as Growth in Manufacturing Slows
